description: Temporary Help Services and Request for Proposal
full_summary:
## National Capital Region Temporary Help Services Requirement

### Tender Information: S4672456

#### Procurement Category: SRV

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking respondents under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) for Telecommunications Analyst, to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

* RFP Reference: S4672456
* RFP Number: N/A
* Tender Closing Date: Thursday, October 19, 2023 at 3:00 PM EST

#### Requirements

* The successful bidder(s) will provide Temporary Help Services, specifically Telecommunications Analysts to support the Department of National Defense.

* The requirement is open to qualified supply arrangement holders, under EN578-172870, who have expertise in Telecommunications Analyst.

#### Notice Type

* Demande de proposition découlant d’un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (Notice of a Request for Proposal resulting from a Supply Arrangement)
* Notice:
	+ Type: RFP
	+ Category: SRV-Service
	+ Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
	+ Tender Closing Date: October 19, 2023
	+ Supplier Type: Limited to Supply Arrangement winners participating in this competition

#### Tender Conditions
This tender is governed by the Government of Canada Tendering Contracts legislation and its terms and conditions as described in the attached documents.

#### Contact Information

* Minister of National Defense (DND)
* Contact Info: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

#### Trade Agreements
* CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* CPTPP (Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans- Pacific Partnership)

#### Attachment
The documents listed below are available in electronic format:
* Tender Notice: [View/Download PDF]
* Request for Proposal: [View/Download PDF]
